description: Throws an Armored Shield, which gives 100% block chance to pets it passes over, and deals 50% Damage
Throws an Armored Shield, which gives 90% block chance to pets it passes over, and deals 50% Damage
Pemanently gives all pets +1% Crit Chance, +5% Crit DMG, and +2% ability regen speed
Pemanently gives all pets +1% Crit Chance, +5% Crit DMG, and +2% ability regen speed. After 20 stacks, additional stacks give less bonus.
